articles.description: Many people are shocked at how their powerful security forces were overwhelmed by Hamas.

articles.description: The US president says he condemns the "unprecedented and appalling assault" by Hamas militants.
articles.title: Joe Biden sends military aid to Israel after Hamas attack

articles.description: Hundreds are feared dead after the 6.3-magnitude quake hit remote villages in western Afghanistan.

articles.description: Part of a Democratic dynasty, Mr Kennedy is expected to announce an independent bid for president.
articles.title: Who will actually vote for Robert F Kennedy Jr as an independent candidate?

articles.title: Oil prices rally on fear of Middle East supply disruptions

articles.description: Scientists in the US are trying to find enzymes or bacteria that will decompose manmade fibres.
articles.title: The hunt for a new way to tackle clothing waste

articles.description: Kenyan Kelvin Kiptum shatters the men's marathon world record in Chicago as he beats compatriot Eliud Kipchoge's previous mark by more than 30 seconds.
articles.title: Kiptum shatters world marathon record in Chicago

articles.description: A £325m cash injection, as well as refinancing £600m of debt, will enable it to keep expanding, it says.

articles.description: To the anger of his supporters, the US president is ramping up deportation and expanding the wall.
articles.title: Biden cannot escape Trump's shadow in border crisis
